alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Lewis; Oswego (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 24 at 6:00PM EST until January 26 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM WEDNESDAY TO 7 PM EST THURSDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. The snow may mix with sleet at times Wednesday night. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 11 inches. * WHERE...The Eastern Lake Ontario Region. Greatest snow accumulations will likely be across the higher terrain of the Tug Hill Plateau and near the Saint Lawrence River. * WHEN...From 1 PM Wednesday to 7 PM EST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult with snow covered roads and poor visibility. The hazardous conditions will impact the evening commute on Wednesday and the morning and evening commutes on Thursday.
info.instruction: Widespread accumulating snow will create dangerous travel conditions. Submit snow reports through our website or social media.
